sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import './index.scss' import { addCart } from '../../../store/modules/takeaway' const Foods = ({ id, picture, name, unit, description, food_tag_list, month_saled, like_ratio_desc, price, tag, count }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{name}
{unit}
{description}
{food_tag_list.join(' ')}
月售{month_saled} {like_ratio_desc}
¥ {price}
dispatch(addCart({ id, picture, name, unit, description, food_tag_list, month_saled, like_ratio_desc, price, tag, count:1 }))}>+
) } export default Foods
